components.db

Class DataRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.db.DataRow

  • public class DataRow
extends Object
    DataRow A DataRow represents a single row from a record set.

      • replaceFields

        public BBjString replaceFields(BBjString Formula$)
        Method replaceFields: search and replace all the field names in a given string (formula) with the field value. The field name should be escaped as "$F{name}".
        Parameters:
        BBjString - formula$: the string with the escaped field names
        Returns:
        BBjString formula$: the replaced string
